verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Jogoo wa shamba
awika sote tuitikie mwito,
arusi ni wito,
wakwaya twaimba. x2
Imba imba imba imba
asema Bwana.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Arusi ni wito twimbe
kwa shangwe tukisifu.
(Sisi sote tuusifu wito,
wito ni wa Mungu tujitimu). x2

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Asema,
arusi ya kwanza ni yake
shambani Edeni
kawashikanisha Adam na Hawa
aawa-shikanisha
Adam na Hawa.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Tuyakumbuke aliyoyasema,
shambani Edeni
na arusi Kena,
Anena
arusi ni wito iheshimiwe
na watu wote. x2
